actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Corning National Fish Hatchery to the State of Arkansas.
short_title: Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act of 1995

summary.text: Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Arkansas, without reimbursement and by a specified date, the Corning National Fish Hatchery (popularly known as the William H. Donham State Fish Hatchery) near Corning, Arkansas.

titles.title: Corning National Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act of 1995
A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Corning National Fish Hatchery to the State of Arkansas.
